page.title: 15WEEKEND HOMELIFE IN SALTBURN
page.content: On a Sunday morning I rise at 8.00am get washed, dressed, have breakfast of egg and tomato on toast, then gather my pony's gear. Mum, Dad and I drive to the stables to ride. I ride my pony, Shamrock. We ride on the beach with the riding school. Later, while Mum is making lunch, Dad takes me to Middlesbrough to pick up Grandad, who comes to lunch every Sunday. When it is ready, we all sit down and eat. After lunch I read for a while, then go to see our neighbour, Aunty Joan. I help her in the garden because Uncle Rab has gone to work in Manchester. Later I go back and say goodbye to Grandad at about 5.00pm. I talk to Mum while she makes tea. When Dad returns, we have tea and settle down to watch television. I go to bed at 8.30pm. (My name is Sophie Moore.)
